text: Norville "Shaggy" Rogers is a fictional character from Scooby-Doo. Shaggy is best friends with his dog Scooby Doo. Shaggy likes to eat a lot of food and gets scared easily and is known for saying his catchphrase, "Zoinks". ==Portrayals== Shaggy has been voiced by Casey Kasem and Matthew Lillard, with the latter reprising his role from the two Raja Gosnell movies. Will Forte roles the voice of Shaggy in CGI animated film Scoob!. ==Internet memes== Various internet memes portray Shaggy as a god who uses a low percentage of his power after eating Scooby Snacks. Matthew Lillard thought the Ultra Instinct Shaggy memes were funny and loved them. ==Appearances== ===Television series=== * Scooby-Doo, Where Are You! * The New Scooby-Doo Movies * What's New, Scooby-Doo? * Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated * Be Cool, Scooby-Doo! * Scooby-Doo and Guess Who? ===Films=== * Scooby-Doo (2002) - (Main role) * Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed (2004) - (Main role) * Scoob! (2020) - (Main role) Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1969 Category:Internet memes Category:Scooby-Doo characters Category:Animated human characters Category:Animated movie characters Category:Animated television characters
title: Shaggy Rogers (Scooby-Doo)
